content.text: Match ends, Chelsea 2, Manchester City 1.
Second Half ends, Chelsea 2, Manchester City 1.
N'Golo Kanté (Chelsea) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by N'Golo Kanté (Chelsea).
David Silva (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt missed. John Stones (Manchester City) right footed shot from very close range is too high. Assisted by Vincent Kompany with a headed pass following a corner.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Thibaut Courtois.
Attempt saved. Sergio Agüero (Manchester City) right footed shot from the right side of the six yard box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Nolito with a through ball.
Substitution, Chelsea. Ruben Loftus-Cheek replaces Eden Hazard.
Marcos Alonso (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by David Silva (Manchester City).
Attempt missed. Gary Cahill (Chelsea) header from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Willian with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Gaël Clichy.
Substitution, Manchester City. Nolito replaces Leroy Sané.
Vincent Kompany (Manchester City) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Eden Hazard (Chelsea) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Vincent Kompany (Manchester City).
Diego Costa (Chelsea) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by John Stones (Manchester City).
Substitution, Chelsea. Willian replaces Cesc Fàbregas.
Attempt missed. Sergio Agüero (Manchester City) right footed shot from a difficult angle on the right is close, but misses to the right following a corner.
Attempt missed. John Stones (Manchester City) header from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by David Silva with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by N'Golo Kanté.
Attempt blocked. Fernandinho (Manchester City) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Raheem Sterling.
Substitution, Manchester City. Raheem Sterling replaces Kevin De Bruyne.
Hand ball by David Silva (Manchester City).
Fabian Delph (Manchester City) is shown the yellow card.
Diego Costa (Chelsea) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Fabian Delph (Manchester City).
Attempt missed. Eden Hazard (Chelsea) right footed shot from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Pedro.
Attempt blocked. David Luiz (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Diego Costa (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Vincent Kompany (Manchester City).
Eden Hazard (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Vincent Kompany (Manchester City).
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by David Luiz.
Fernandinho (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Nemanja Matic (Chelsea).
Attempt missed. John Stones (Manchester City) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by David Silva following a set piece situation.
Vincent Kompany (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Diego Costa (Chelsea).
Attempt saved. Pedro (Chelsea) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Eden Hazard.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by David Luiz.
Attempt saved. John Stones (Manchester City) header from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by David Silva with a cross.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by N'Golo Kanté.
Gary Cahill (Chelsea) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Sergio Agüero (Manchester City).
Pedro (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by David Silva (Manchester City).
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by N'Golo Kanté.
David Silva (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by N'Golo Kanté (Chelsea).
Attempt blocked. N'Golo Kanté (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Gary Cahill.
Gaël Clichy (Manchester City) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Gaël Clichy (Manchester City).
Pedro (Chelsea) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Attempt missed. Fernandinho (Manchester City) right footed shot from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Fabian Delph following a set piece situation.
Foul by César Azpilicueta (Chelsea).
Leroy Sané (Manchester City) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Nemanja Matic (Chelsea).
Fabian Delph (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
David Silva (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by N'Golo Kanté (Chelsea).
Substitution, Chelsea. Nemanja Matic replaces Kurt Zouma.
Second Half begins Chelsea 2, Manchester City 1.
First Half ends, Chelsea 2, Manchester City 1.
Eden Hazard (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Gaël Clichy (Manchester City).
Offside, Chelsea. David Luiz tries a through ball, but César Azpilicueta is caught offside.
Diego Costa (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Fabian Delph (Manchester City).
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Thibaut Courtois.

Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Gary Cahill.
Attempt blocked. Sergio Agüero (Manchester City) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by David Silva.
Goal!  Chelsea 2, Manchester City 1. Eden Hazard (Chelsea) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the centre of the goal following a set piece situation.
Penalty saved! Eden Hazard (Chelsea) fails to capitalise on this great opportunity,  right footed shot saved  in the bottom right corner.
Penalty conceded by Fernandinho (Manchester City) after a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty Chelsea. Pedro draws a foul in the penalty area.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Gary Cahill.

Attempt saved. Leroy Sané (Manchester City) right footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by David Silva with a through ball.
Goal!  Chelsea 1, Manchester City 1. Sergio Agüero (Manchester City) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the centre of the goal.
Attempt saved. David Silva (Manchester City) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal.
Foul by Cesc Fàbregas (Chelsea).
Fabian Delph (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

Attempt saved. Fernandinho (Manchester City) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top right corner. Assisted by Sergio Agüero.
Attempt missed. Fabian Delph (Manchester City) left footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Jesús Navas.
Foul by Diego Costa (Chelsea).
Fabian Delph (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt blocked. Sergio Agüero (Manchester City) right footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Leroy Sané.
Goal!  Chelsea 1, Manchester City 0. Eden Hazard (Chelsea) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by César Azpilicueta.
Attempt missed. Diego Costa (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Eden Hazard.
First Half begins.
Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
